```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(lubridate)

tue <- as_date("2025-01-13")
thur <- tue+days(2)

advdate <- function(day, week) {
  date <- (day + weeks(week-1))
  dm <- paste(month(date, label = TRUE)," ",day(date))
  return(dm)  
} 
```
